        Check if stockpile is full
        Returns:
        True if stockpile is full, else false

      • itemClick

        public void itemClick(int mod)
        Itemact with gob, to fill trough with item in hand for example
        Parameters:
        mod - 1 = shift, 2 = ctrl, 4 = alt, 3 = shift + ctrl (all)

      • addGobText

        public int addGobText(java.lang.String text,
                      int height)
        Add cool hovering text above gob
        Parameters:
        text - text to add
        height - height that the hext hovers at
        Returns:
        Returns id of the text, which can be used to remove the text with removeGobText

      • removeGobText

        public void removeGobText(int id)
        Remove an added hovering text from gob that was added with addGobText
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the gobtext

      • doClick

        public void doClick(int button,
                    int mod,
                    int meshId)
        Click the gob
        Parameters:
        button - 1 = Left click, 3 = Right click
        mod - 0 = no modifier, 1 = shift, 2 = ctrl, 4 = alt
        meshId - can be a door, roasting spit etc.

      • pfClick

        public boolean pfClick(int btn,
                       int mod,
                       int meshId)
        Click a gob with pathfinder, with given button, wait until pathfinder is finished
        Parameters:
        btn - 1 = left click, 3 = right click
        mod - 1 = shift, 2 = ctrl, 4 = alt
        meshId - meshid to click
        Returns:
        True if path was found, or false if not

        mod - 1 = shift, 2 = ctrl, 4 = alt
        Returns:
        True if path was found, or false if not

      • itemClickAll

        public void itemClickAll()
        Repeat shift + itemact until all similar items from the inventory have been clicked insinde trough etc. May result in valuable items accidentally being put in troughs etc...
